supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-16 (in mm), (1) 25 x 33, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (2) 51 x 73, (A) 5 lines, right margin, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (3) 50 x 43, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 43 x 35, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 35 x 26, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 27 x 12, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, left margin, (7) 21 x 15, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, no margins, (8) 14 x 20, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 37 x 16, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (10) 37 x 20, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (11) 48 x 16, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 97 x 41, (A) 4 lines, left top margins, (B) traces, (13) 65 x 24, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (14) 63 x 30, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (15) 49 x 34, (A) 4 lines, left margin, (B) traces, (16) 78 x 37, (A) 4 lines, left bottom margin, (B) 4 lines, no margins

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
